name: div
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on all orders
Close-Fitting Design : Thumb closes to the ring finger for a secure grip & enhanced control
Shallow, Higher Sitting Pocket : Increases feel & allows for quick transfers

Close Thumb to Ring Finger Design : Reinforces control & precision on every play
Individualized Fit : Molds uniquely to each athlete’s hand for a personalized, game-ready fit
